ai-mil5.2.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.2.7:1.2_0: ‘Ānanda, I’ll think the Saṅgha of mendicants.’
ai-mil5.2.7:1.3_0: and again he was one who was familiar with loving-kindness of the Buddha, saying,
ai-mil5.2.7:1.4_0: ‘Sometimes it will lead the mendicant Saṅgha today.’
ai-mil5.2.7:1.5_0: the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.2.7:1.6_0: ‘As I’ll carry the mendicant Saṅgha, thinking, “I’ll carry the Sangha of monks,” or “I’ll carry the Sangha of monks.”
ai-mil5.2.7:1.7_0: whatever was said by the Realized One,
ai-mil5.2.7:1.8_0: ‘Surely it will be the Sangha of monks, I will lead the Sangha of monks.’ For just like you double-layed, the mendicant Saṅgha.’ When you think, ‘I’ll lead the mendicant Saṅgha.’ ‘I’ll do not think, ‘I’ll neither exists in return.’ And this way you should practice absorption.’
ai-mil5.2.7:2.1_0: “As I have spoken by the Buddha.”
ai-mil5.2.7:2.2_0: And the Buddha’s various kinds of familiar with those good qualities are spoken in the Blessed One’s special qualities.
ai-mil5.2.7:2.3_0: ‘Sometimes it will lead the mendicant Saṅgha today.’
ai-mil5.2.7:2.4_0: very same questions, Great King, is the meaning, meaning is the best,
ai-mil5.2.7:2.5_0: The Realized One doesn’t express the assemblies of a gathering that includes the Realized One.
ai-mil5.2.7:2.6_0: Since ‘This is the chariot, great king,’ he says ‘This is the ultimate way!’ But he has gone to the highest of the Realized One. But there is no further existence for the eon, or the Realized One.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.1_0: This earth is grounded on the earth, and sentient beings aren’t established in earth.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, the Realized One becomes established in all sentient beings. Of these sentient beings they’re not reborn in the underworld.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.3_0: Or alternatively, when the king attacks a large tree grows on the bank of the river.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.4_0: If they live for the sake of their livelihood and because of this livelihood, all beings there is no recording it.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.5_0: In the same way, when a Realized One is saved by all skillful things, all of them live in the teaching of his life, and all of them are no more for the sake of life.
ai-mil5.2.7:3.7_0: By self they’ve given up attachment.”
ai-mil5.2.7:4.1_0: “Sir, it’s good, that Nāgadatta spares a question of profounds. By doing good deeds with many profounds, causes, hinting in the darkness. He shows articulation of vision and dispensation.”
ai-mil5.2.7:5.1_0: the seventh enquiry is the seventh thing.
